main event: A round object with four trailing lights was observed over Marion, Indiana during a ground-radar observation.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 7 minutes., One of the lights appeared brighter than the others., The object was at a 60-degree elevation and moved downward over the horizon., The sighting occurred at 2215 GMT on 21 May 1964., A B-58 was flying over Marion, Indiana at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: round object with four trailing lights
witness description: State Policeman James Bradley from Pendleton State Police.
